title: Sunday Service - Meditation & Discourse
venueName: Ramakrishna Vedanta Society of North Texas
body:
Join us for our weekly Sunday Service featuring guided meditation followed by a discourse on Vedanta philosophy.

## Schedule

- **11:00 AM - 11:30 AM**: Meditation
- **11:30 AM - 12:15 PM**: Discourse and Discussion
- **12:15 PM - 12:30 PM**: Arati (Vesper Service)

## What to Bring

- Comfortable clothing for sitting
- Open mind and heart
- Questions are welcome!

All are welcome regardless of background or experience level.
